remarks: Value of the pairing functor on morphisms.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2017.)
statement:
prfval.k $e |- P = ( F pairF G ) $.
prfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
prfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
prfval.c $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
prfval.d $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( C Func E ) ) $.
prf1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
prf2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
prf2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( X H Y ) ) $.
prf2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X ( 2nd ` P ) Y ) ` K ) = <. ( ( X ( 2nd ` F ) Y ) ` K ) , ( ( X ( 2nd ` G ) Y ) ` K ) >. ) $.
